TEXT: enore atyo xaokanatyakalati iraiti cristo isa womana hoka wiyakaihenere xihiye atyo exe: enore atyo xaokanatyakalati maisa makaliroti aka ihiye

ha judeu ogwerovia eꞌy vaꞌe katu ombopoxy judeu eꞌy-pe inheꞌe apo-vy hesu reroviaha-rehe onheꞌe vai rei cristo kwery-rehe upea-gwi upe pygwa ndaijaꞌevei-ma cristo kwery-rehe ha hesu remimondo mokoi vaꞌe are joty opyta upe-py oiko-vy ipyꞌagwasu reheve omombeꞌu nhandejary nheꞌe oiko-vy nhandejary-rehe ojerovia-gwi ndaikyhyjeiry voi: “nhandejary ko nhande rexakwaa rei vaꞌe” heꞌi ikyhyje eꞌy reheve ha nhandejary oipytygwo voi ixupe nhandejary nheꞌe-py hembiapo pora hexapyra-rupi inheꞌe-py nhane rembiexa eꞌy vaꞌe ojapo upea-gwi: —anhetegwa nipo raꞌe inheꞌe heꞌi upe pygwa

dooh jesus takꞌep hyb nꞌaa jawyk do hꞌyy gajee hom ba ji ha tamoo wat ne he ji ha taky dang doo be da tahꞌyyb hejꞌoonh be neret hyb nꞌaa ta ha be hꞌyy kaꞌeeh doo be da tamo nꞌaa jesuu nesaa do yb mahanh be aa ky daheeh jesus anꞌoo ba aa hapah be moo boo hadꞌyyt ne he be ha aa mejuu doo

zezuz uzeꞌeg pet pe aꞌe kury wamaiꞌu re uzeꞌeg zezuz ximaw pet pe aꞌe kury — ne ximaw zuaw taꞌyr ne aipo heamutar katu pe amogwer heremimuꞌe wanuwi ne iꞌi izupe — hezar azeharomoete uruamutar katu ihe iꞌi izupe — arapuharan wazar uzekaiw katu weimaw wanehe aꞌe wa nezewegatete ezekaiw katu herehe uzeruzar romo maꞌe wanehe nehe no iꞌi izupe

zezuz uzeꞌeg eri tur haw rehe aꞌe kury nan kwehe tete wezyw zezuz oho ywytyr wi kury wemimuꞌe wanupi kury wata mehe we uzeꞌeg wanupe — pemumeꞌu zo penemixak kwer teko wanupe nehe ty wa iꞌi wanupe — ihe awa taꞌyr ihe akweraw wi putar hemano re ihe nehe xo aꞌe ꞌar mehe zo pemumeꞌu wanupe nehe iꞌi wanupe aꞌe rupi numumeꞌu kwaw wanupe wa uzeꞌeg uzeupeupe wa — akweraw wi putar ihe nehe iꞌi zezuz zanewe iꞌi uzeupeupe wa — marazawe tuwe uzeꞌeg nezewe aꞌe iꞌi uzeupeupe wa

—ꞌawamu tepekwaap ꞌga nemikwasiarer imu etee futat je manui imuapyra ꞌara rupi etee teferapa nu ꞌawamu peꞌje pejewau je momeꞌwau ꞌga nupe jerusareg ipewara ꞌga nupe raꞌne je momeꞌwau “jejui ꞌga amanu futat aꞌere imuapyra ꞌara rupi ꞌga ferawi nu jane katuꞌokaramu aꞌeramu pee pejepoia pejetywer awi” peꞌje ki ꞌga nupe “pejetywer awi pepoiriweramu jejui ꞌga ipeꞌai pe nui pe katuꞌoka” peꞌje ki ꞌga nupe anure kwe pe pejewau tekotee ꞌga momoranupa— ꞌjau ꞌga ꞌga nupe —peesak futat ako je manua aiꞌi ꞌawamu ꞌa pee je ferawa resaka nu je kwaap ꞌa pejepe “janeruwarete ꞌga je mut ae katuꞌokawamu” ꞌea ꞌa pekwaap aꞌeramu pee pejewau je momeꞌwau ꞌga nupe amunawa moymoyka— ꞌjau ꞌga ꞌga nupe oporogytau

aituo myani pedro ton-honre kehoem eyam aguely: — satanas amidyse ato ara kula amidyly deus ispiritury enokuze myguely “idanara tara onro ebyrypyry kaenmakeyby awyly” myguely wane xira dinheru ewy maenkanadybymo tala ola amaemo — kely myani pedro — anguy “onroru vende ieka” kewapyra keanka vende manhepygueduo anguy lagala keanka “idanara dinheru maenmakeyby ady pebanro modoram xuduga” kepa wara ama xurala keanka mara onro tawala ize mato ara amanhetoem vende manhepygueduo ama xurala keanka dinheru wara tawala ize mato ara amanhetoem inakanhe inkaba dinheru maempajigadyly amaemoem iwaga tadasenogudyly myguely ola inakai xina kulela makeba enokuze mygueho deus lapyla wara — kely myani pedro

efeso ta ke ag my carta paulo ty ra ve isy cidade ty efeso ta ke ag my ran ha ve jesus cristo vy inh fegꞌ sy ty ti apostolo je je tope ty isy apostolo han ky ha ky sog ajag my carta tag ran mu tope tu vy ty ajag nyti ky ajag tog cidade ty efeso ta jesus to venhman ti jesus cristo tovanh tu ajag tog nyti

nhym kam jeju amiwyr kot ba djwynh ar ku'uw nhym ar 'yr box nhym arkum —‍ba ar ama are me'o 'uwti ja ne o myjja ket ne tu me kuram o pi'ok kapri raxo ten metindjwynhma kunga me kuni kuram pi'ok kapri raxo ten kum kunga me ja ne me o pi'ok kapri kumex ne kam 'a katam ne kumex ne kam 'a katamja metindjwynhma kunga nhym be me'o nija ne o pi'ok kapri kete pi'ok kapri ngrire ne tu kum kuni nga o kute amikadjy myjja byr ne kren ne tin kadjy metindjwynhma kuni nga kum 'o nor kete kam ne ba me ama —‍nam me kuram pi'ok kapri rax ne kum kunga mramri ne ba ar ama are nam a jeju kot ba djwynh arkum ane

ewily wagala nady adaunlo awyly xutuly jesus aguely: — se takyguenry koenda lela ewisely; kiein-hoem tuduze se takygueim inakanhe kula ewisely; kiein-hoem nudupa ewily wagala se adaunlo awyly xutuly koendonro inakai wara awyly — kely jesus {koenda aguidyly aguykely wagala koendonro kydawyly adutuoly inakanhe aguidyly aguykely wara wagala inakai kydawyly adutuoly wara jesus konomedaze aguely}
